title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-2.11 - Examining boards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-2.11 - Examining boards

State Regulations

For the purposes of preparing, giving, conducting, marking, and reviewing such written examinations the commissioner shall appoint
by order such examining boards as he may deem necessary from time to time to
serve at his discretion. Each board shall have at least three members, in
addition to the department's chief boiler inspector, appointed by the
commissioner on the basis of their experience, knowledge and judgment in regard
to boiler design, construction and operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-2.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
